categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, the Empire fought the Rebel Alliance in a battle in the Dalcretti system. During the battle, an Imperial Army unit was cut off by Rebel forces. Demelza Mintori's unit was unable or refused to provide assistance to Madrix Hansor platoon. The incident started a rivalry between the two that spilled over into their later careers as captains of gladiator walker sports combat teams.
